column4: hi! I have a grub on my sdb5 and I have a grub on sda1. how can I make an entry to the sda1 grub to "redirect" to the sdb5 grub? please don't ask why, just help me do it, if it is possible. :) thanks
it's okay, chainloading works with any bootloader
Dr_Willis: thank you, i check the docs then about chainloading
